summary: This mod has two files, one being a modders resource, and the other being a new player home.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#b22222][size=5][font=comic sans ms,cursive][u][b][i]Castle Dagos[/i][/b][/u][/font][/size][/color]
 
[u][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3][i]Small description[/i][/size][/font][/u]
[font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3][i]This mod has two files, one being a modders resource, and the other being a new player home.[/i][/size][/font]
 
[u][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3][i]Catagories[/i][/size][/font][/u]
[LIST]
[*][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3][i]Story[/i][/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3][i]Modders Resource Permissions[/i][/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3][i]Player Home Permissions[/i][/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3][i]Requirements[/i][/size][/font][/*]
[*][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3][i]Credits[/i][/size][/font][/*]
[/LIST]
[size=3][font=comic sans ms,cursive][i][u]Story[/u][/i][/font][/size]
[i][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3]During the start of the first era, a powerful warlord, named Dagos Silsah, built his fortress, and named it Castle Dagos,. It is said that he was buried under his throne.[/size][/font][/i][i][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3] A hundred years after his death, the village close to his castle, was destroyed by the very dead souls that served under their master, and the doors to the castle shut closed forever. However, there has been rumors, that say the doors have opened, for the return of a new owner.[/size][/font][/i]
 
[u][i][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3]Modders Resource Permissions[/size][/font][/i][/u]
[i][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3]If you download the Modders Resource version, you are allowed to use it in your own mod, but then you are to credit me in the description, and tell me that you have used it.[/size][/font][/i]
 
[u][i][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3]Player Home Permissions[/size][/font][/i][/u]
[i][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3]If you to download the Player Home version, then you shall not be allowed to use it in your own mod.[/size][/font][/i]
 
[i][u][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3]Requirements[/size][/font][/u][/i]
[LIST]
[*][i][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3]Skyrim.esm[/size][/font][/i][/*]
[*][i][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3]Castle Dagos.esp[/size][/font][/i][/*]
[/LIST]
[i][u][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3]Credits[/size][/font][/u][/i]
[LIST]
[*][i][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3]Me/Enoomnai/Damien - for making the mod itself[/size][/font][/i][/*]
[*][i][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=3]Bethesda [/size][/font][/i]- [size=3][font=comic sans ms,cursive][i]for making the best game series ever[/i][/font][/size][/*]
[*][size=3][font=comic sans ms,cursive][i]Nexus - for having an amazing website and mod manager[/i][/font][/size][/*]
[/LIST]
author: Enoomnai
